How to play

This is your character. You have to get it out of the maze.

This is where you have to get your character in order to win the game.

With the arrow keys, you can move the character around.

With these buttons, you can push the row/column in the direction indicated. Click here to see an example.

By clicking on this button, you can rotate the extra tile before placing it on the board by pushing a row/column.

By going through the seeds in the board, you will plant trees and learn important concepts.

Push tiles example
Welcome to ReMaze!

You have to get your character out of the maze in order to win. But this is no regular maze! It is made of tiles, which you will have to change by pushing the rows and columns to create the way out.

Press on Choose Character to select an avatar and start playing. You can press on the question mark (?) icon on the top right on any moment to see the rules.

Choose your character
